txt.en:
'Prospecting nodes for ever-burning ore is more meticulous than just hacking away at metal veins.

'The volatile nature of the ore makes an errant swing of the pickaxe into an explosive event.

'Laden nodes yield the most ore in moderate, small, and large-sized pieces but are the slowest to unearth.

'Go forth and get that ore.'
Prospect laden ever-burning ore nodes to release a harvestable chunk of the ore.
Harvest the laden nodes to find ever-burning ore and keep the cook-fires of Thorin's Hall burning.
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
